bio.p: Olaf Corry is Associate Professor at the Department of Politics, University of Copenhagen. He has recently co-edited (with Hayley Stevenson) a book on Traditions and Trends in Global Environmental Politics: International Relations and the Earth (Routledge, 2017) and is sole author of Constructing a Global Polity (Palgrave Macmillan, 2013). His other publications include journal articles on environmentalism and revolutions (in Eastern Europe), the politics of climate change and the politics of risk and resilience. He gained his PhD from the University of Copenhagen and has previously worked at the Open University (UK) and Cambridge University.
